item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, February 6, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Middle East and Europe condemn Trump’s plans to take over Gaza
2. [Opinion] The deceptively negotiable Donald Trump
3. Wall Street banks offload $5.5bn in debt linked to Musk’s Twitter takeover
4. UnitedHealth refers Bill Ackman’s social post to US securities watchdog
5. White House insists Trump has ‘not committed’ to sending US troops to Gaza
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, February 6, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
